sentences.en: Adjuration prohibits the false conduct propaganda of afore - mentioned products.
sentences.cn: 严令禁止上述产品的虚假宣传.

sentences.en: Whoever is partner with a thief hates his own soul; He hears the adjuration utters nothing.
sentences.cn: 与盗贼均分的,是恨恶自己的性命; 他听见叫人发誓作证的声音,却不言语.

sentences.en: With this hurried adjuration, he cocked his blunderbuss, and stood on the offensive.
sentences.cn: 他仓促地叫了一声, 便扳开几支大口径短抢的机头, 作好防守准备.

words.tran_cn: 恳请，恳求；起誓；（以起誓或诅咒等形式）命令
